bibdata.abstract: The definition of constant k in Equation 2 (in 8.3) and line terminal rated voltage in the last paragraph of 10.8.2 are corrected in this corrigendum.
The definition of constant k in Equation 2 (in 8.3) and line terminal rated voltage in the last paragraph of 10.8.2 are corrected in this corrigendum.
